summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Czech cultural booking system (KulturaBooking). All backend APIs passed (100% - 21/21 tests). Registration wizard 4-step flow working correctly. Programs page with dual tabs (Detail/Nastavení) functioning. GDPR page complete with 9 Czech legal sections. Mobile responsive design verified (375px).

minor.issue: DialogContent missing DialogTitle for screen readers (console warning)

issues: Submit button text 'Vytvořit účet instituce' truncated on mobile viewport - shows as 'Vytvořit úč...'
Missing DialogTitle for accessibility - should add VisuallyHidden title for screen readers

passed_tests: Registration Step 1 - basic institution info with GDPR consent
Registration Step 2 - address, city, IČ/DIČ, logo, colors
Registration Step 3 - available days and time blocks
Complete registration creates institution and redirects to admin
Programs page - list view with Duplikovat/Archivovat buttons
Programs page - create new program via dialog
Programs page - Detail tab (basic info, capacity, pricing, settings, status)
Programs page - Nastavení tab (days, time blocks, dates, booking params)
GDPR page - all 9 Czech legal sections rendered
action_items: Consider truncating or adjusting button text on mobile for 'Vytvořit účet instituce' button
Add VisuallyHidden DialogTitle component for accessibility compliance
critical_code_review_comments: Console warnings about DialogContent missing DialogTitle - should wrap with VisuallyHidden for screen reader accessibility
Login form missing data-testid attributes on input fields - should add for better test automation
seed_data_creation: Multiple test institutions created during registration wizard tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs fully tested with pytest. Registration 4-step wizard flow verified end-to-end. Programs page with dual tabs (Detail/Nastavení) confirmed working. GDPR page has all 9 sections. Login credentials for test user: test@muzeum.cz / password123. Mobile viewport 375px tested.

registration_wizard.step1_basic_info: PASS - Institution name, type, country, email, password, GDPR consent
registration_wizard.step2_address_branding: PASS - Address, city selector, IČ/DIČ, logo upload, color pickers
registration_wizard.step3_schedule: PASS - Day selection (Po-Ne), time blocks with add/remove, date range
registration_wizard.step4_program_defaults: PASS - Description, duration, capacity, target group selector
registration_wizard.complete_flow: PASS - Creates institution, user, theme settings, redirects to admin

programs_page.list_view: PASS - Shows program cards with status badges, duration, capacity
programs_page.action_buttons: PASS - Duplikovat and Archivovat buttons on each card
programs_page.detail_tab: PASS - Basic info, capacity/trvání, ceník, další nastavení, status
programs_page.nastaveni_tab: PASS - Nabízené dny, časové bloky, termín, parametry rezervace
programs_page.status_options: PASS - Aktivní, Koncept, Archivovat radio buttons

gdpr_page.sections: PASS - All 9 sections: správce, účely, právní základ, rozsah, doba uchování, práva, kontakt, zabezpečení, cookies
gdpr_page.czech_content: PASS - Czech legal terminology and references to GDPR/zákon č. 110/2019 Sb.
